circumstances:
The crew was taking part to a bombing mission over the Mimoyecques airfield. In flight, the bomber was shot down by enemy fire and crashed into the sea off Wissant. All seven crew members were killed. 
Crew (44th Squadron):
F/L F. X. Merrick, 
Sgt R. D. J. C. Carling, 
F/O J. Poulter, 
F/O R. N. Bartlett, 
Sgt C. Dickinson, 
Sgt H. P. Warll, 
Sgt J. W. Thomas.
